name: Celbroken
description:
QUICK! We're running out of time to finish the GD Game Jam 2022, and we need you to help us finish a game in 48 hours! Can you effectively manage Celbreak before we lose our sanity?

How to play main game:

mouse over the characters to select them. When they are selected, press the buttons to have them do something.

You need to manage everyone's sleep, food, motivation, and burnout levels.

If any of those hit 0 (or burnout hits max), you lose the game.

Fill the progress bar to win.

Progress can only be attained by completing Work.
